snippet.title: Manalith - Gameplay 1
snippet.description:
Wishlist Manalith on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1408810/Manalith/ 

Manalith combines some of the ideas from the Freepath and Phosphene prototypes into a relaxed exploration & adventure game.

You'll explore an ethereal island world and attempt to reactivate all 100 of the ancient Manaliths. To reach them all you'll need to jump, glide, climb, and swim through woods, cliffs, and caves.

From time to time, you might even need to blow up some walls.
